summary: Front-end developer with 1.5+ years of professional experience building interactive web applications using Vue.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Comfortable working across the stack, with experience in RESTful APIs, authentication, real-time databases, and WebSocket communication. Proven ability to develop real-time interfaces and collaborate on bothfrontend and backend tasks.

responsibilities: Developed an interface using Vue.js, JavaScript, WebSockets, and the Web Audio API in ComfyUI for real-time voice communication with an AI-powered voice bot.
Built a real-time automatic speech recognition (ASR) interface using FastAPI, Whisper model, HTML, and CSS with audio recording, live transcriptions, timestamp visualization, and evaluation metrics.
Contributed to the company blog by updating and adding content using WordPress.
Designed and developed a faculty-facing web application for tracking student progress.
Monitored student performance and provided guidance in JavaScript, C, and Python.
Refactored the organization's page using Vue.js, Vue Apollo, GraphQL, and TypeScript.
Managed both front-end and back-end aspects, implementing GraphQL queries for CRUD operations and ensuring real-time updates.
Contributed to the companyâ€™s design system.
Worked with clients to implement requested features using Jira for ticket management.

notable_projects.name: HISI Interface: Hear It, See It
notable_projects.description: A real-time, modular, open-source ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) performance evaluation tool. Provides a visual and interactive way to assess ASR models, supporting live transcription, file upload, interactive timeline, and a plug-and-play architecture for different ASR engines. Engineered for low latency and open to community contributions.

challenges.situation: Needed to extend ComfyUI's front-end for new features.
challenges.action: Cloned and debugged the open-source ComfyUI codebase, learned its architecture, and implemented new features such as zip upload for workflows, which were not available in the original project.

career_goals: To become a leading developer in real-time AI-powered applications, contribute to open-source projects, and work on innovative solutions that bridge user experience and advanced technology.
professional_qualities: Recognized by previous team members as productive, reliable, and professional collaborator
Comfortable taking on tasks beyond core expertise by quickly learning and delivering effective solutions
